title: Calculate Carbon Credits from No-Till Farming
description: A farmer who has switched to no-till farming wants to estimate the amount of carbon credits they may be eligible for.

tasks.description: Gather data on the farm's acreage, location, soil type, and number of years under no-till practice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary parameters.

tasks.description: Use an approved carbon sequestration model to calculate the estimated tons of CO2 equivalent sequestered per year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the estimated carbon sequestration amount.

tasks.description: Provide an estimate of the potential financial value based on current carbon market prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives an estimated monetary value of the generated credits.
